thinking about getting the rt evp...don't know if i should get a standard r=
ecorder or this..seems like this would make more sense

--- On Mon, 1/10/11=
, Urkel23 <urkel23@...> wrote:


From: Urkel23 <urkel23@...>
Subjec=
t: [EVP-ITC] Re: ZOOM H2
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Date: Monday, January =
10, 2011, 4:56 PM


=C2=A0 




I've had the H4 and the edirol r-09, both h=
ave superior sound quality. Just like Zack, i bought it to record my band d=
uring practice. 

When i took up ghost box stuff, i just used what i had.

=
For regular evp work, i use my 2 panasonic rr-dr60's, rrqr200 and rrqr100. =
I also have the rt-evp, which is great for evps. The sound quality on that =
recorder is unbelievable.

It also has a ghost box built in, but i don't us=
e that feature. I think you can get that around $200 now on ebay. For my gh=
ost box work, i use my edirol r-09.

-Steve

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com=

>

n recommends that unit.
